attributes.action: Award the BCO AND GCO  AND TEAM  OF B.A.R.S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BCO ,GCO AND arrse team  has for over the last four years have devoted all of their  time and effort into the continual development of the community of British army rumor service   they have allowed people to come and express how they feel , helped lots of vulnerable people and charities and all members of the arrse community . The people of B.A.R.S. and surrounding area’s feel an overwhelming sense of gratitude and debt for what BCO AND GCO  has achieved as both ADMIN OF B.A.R.S. . 

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minster to award BCO AND GCO  to be recognised and all the B.A.R.S. community for working so hard to help the most vulnerable people in the u.k. etc

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
